25 class GasProperties {
26 public:
41  GasProperties( std::function< double ( double t ) > specificHeat,
42  const double molecularWeight,
43  const double specificWeight,
44  const double compPercent,
45  const double compByVol,
46  const int o2Generated,
47  const int heatingValue,
48  const int heatingValueVolume,
49  const double h2oGenerated,
50  const double co2Generated) :
51  specificHeat(std::move(specificHeat)), molecularWeight(molecularWeight), specificWeight(specificWeight),
52  compByVol(compPercent), compAdjByVol(compByVol), h2oGenerated(h2oGenerated), co2Generated(co2Generated),
53  o2Generated(o2Generated), heatingValue(heatingValue), heatingValueVolume(heatingValueVolume)
54  {};
55 
56 private:
57  friend class GasCompositions;
58  const std::function< double ( double t ) > specificHeat;
59  // compByWeight == X double bar, compAdjByVol == X bar in document
60  double compByWeight = 0;
61  const double molecularWeight, specificWeight, compByVol, compAdjByVol, h2oGenerated, co2Generated;
62 
63  // TODO so2Generated is always 0 according to the one table, are these all the gas types we deal with or not?
64  const int so2Generated = 0, o2Generated, heatingValue, heatingValueVolume;
65 };

74 class GasCompositions {

94  GasCompositions(std::string substance, const double CH4, const double C2H6, const double N2,
95  const double H2, const double C3H8, const double C4H10_CnH2n, const double H2O,
96  const double CO, const double CO2, const double SO2, const double O2) :
97  substance(std::move(substance)),
98  totalPercent(CH4 + C2H6 + N2 + H2 + C3H8 + C4H10_CnH2n + H2O + CO + CO2 + SO2 + O2),
99  CH4(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { return 4.23 + 0.01177 * t; }, 16.042, 0.042417, CH4,
100  CH4 / totalPercent, 64, 23875, 1012, 36.032, 44.01)),
101  C2H6(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { return 4.04 + 0.01636 * t; }, 30.068, 0.079503, C2H6,
102  C2H6 / totalPercent, 112, 22323, 1773, 54.048, 88.02)),
103  N2(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { return 9.47 - 3.47 * 1000 / t + 1.07 * 1000000 / (t * t); },
104  28.016, 0.074077, N2, N2 / totalPercent, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)),
105  H2(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { return 5.76 + 0.578 * t / 1000 + 20 / pow(t, 0.5); }, 2.016, 0.005331,
106  H2, H2 / totalPercent, 16, 61095, 325, 18.016, 0)),
107  C3H8(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { (void)t; return 17.108; }, 44.094, 0.116589, C3H8,
108  C3H8 / totalPercent, 160, 21669, 2523, 72.064, 132.03)),
109  C4H10_CnH2n(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { (void)t; return 22.202; }, 58.12, 0.153675, C4H10_CnH2n,
110  C4H10_CnH2n / totalPercent, 208, 21321, 3270, 90.08, 176.04)),
111  H2O(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { return 19.86 - 597 / pow(t, 0.5) + 7500 / t; }, 18.016, 0.047636, H2O,
112  H2O / totalPercent, 0, 0, 0, 18.016, 0)),
113  CO(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { return 9.46 - 3.29 * 1000 / t + 1.07 * 1000000 / (t * t); },
114  28.01, 0.074061, CO, CO / totalPercent, 16, 4347, 321, 0, 44.01)),
115  CO2(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { return 16.2 - 6.53 * 1000 / t + 1.41 * 1000000 / (t * t); },
116  44.01, 0.116367, CO2, CO2 / totalPercent, 0, 0, 0, 0, 44.01)),
117  SO2(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { (void)t; return 17.472; }, 64.06, 0.169381, SO2, SO2 * 100 / totalPercent,
118  0, 0, 0, 0, 0)),
119  O2(std::make_shared<GasProperties>([] (double t) { return 11.515 - 172 / pow(t, 0.5) + 1530 / t; }, 32.00, 0.084611, O2,
120  O2 / totalPercent, -32, 0, 0, 0, 0))
121  {
122  gasses = {{"CH4", this->CH4}, {"C2H6", this->C2H6}, {"N2", this->N2}, {"H2", this->H2},
123  {"C3H8", this->C3H8}, {"C4H10_CnH2n", this->C4H10_CnH2n}, {"H2O", this->H2O}, {"CO", this->CO},
124  {"CO2", this->CO2}, {"SO2", this->SO2}, {"O2", this->O2}};
125 
126  calculateCompByWeight();
127  heatingValue = calculateHeatingValueFuel();
128  heatingValueVolume = calculateHeatingValueFuelVolume();
129  specificGravity = calculateSpecificGravity();
130  }
131 
137  double getGasByVol(const std::string & gasName) const {
138  auto const gas = gasses.find(gasName);
139  if (gas == gasses.end()) {
140  throw std::runtime_error("Cannot find " + gasName + " in gasses");
141  }
142  return gas->second->compByVol;
143  }
144 
145  double getHeatingValue() const { return heatingValue; };
146  double getHeatingValueVolume() const { return heatingValueVolume; };
147  double getSpecificGravity() const { return specificGravity; };

242 class GasFlueGasMaterial {
243 public:
253  GasFlueGasMaterial(const double flueGasTemperature, const double excessAirPercentage,
254  const double combustionAirTemperature, GasCompositions compositions,
255  const double fuelTemperature) :
256  flueGasTemperature(flueGasTemperature), excessAirPercentage(excessAirPercentage / 100.0),
257  combustionAirTemperature(combustionAirTemperature), fuelTemperature(fuelTemperature),
258  compositions(std::move(compositions))
259  {}

266  double getHeatLoss();
267 
268 private:
269  const double flueGasTemperature, excessAirPercentage, combustionAirTemperature, fuelTemperature;
270  GasCompositions compositions;
271 };
